text: Yves Poilane (born 11 December 1959) is a French manager and President of universities. He is the former Director of the technological department of the IONIS Education Group, the first group in France for private higher education. Groupe Ionis – 1er opérateur privé de l’enseignement supérieur Poilane graduated from École Polytechnique. He also graduated from Télécom ParisTech with a Master's degree. He has a career in telecommunications.Who's Who in France, 2018 In 1989, he moved to higher education by joining Telecom Bretagne as Deputy Manager. Then, he became CEO of Télécom ParisTech in 2007 before joining IONIS Education Group in 2019.YVES POILANE He retires in December 2023, replaced by Philippe Jamet.YVES POILANE == References == Category:Living people Category:French engineers Category:1959 births Category:Alumni of the École Polytechnique
title: Yves Poilane
